index.title: You are on
index.description: A simple, secure, and fully customizable URL shortener designed to protect your privacy.

features.title:
You are going

to love

our service

.
features.description_1: All data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted to ensure maximum security.
features.description_2: The interface is designed to be simple and user-friendly for all users, even for your grandparents.
features.description_3: Your data is stored on servers based in Europe in accordance with GDPR to ensure complete integrity and confidentiality.
features.description_4: Our servers are designed to provide optimal performance and maximum availability for all users.
features.description_5: Our service offers a wide variety of customization options when creating shortened links for your URLs.
features.description_6: Our API is open to all developers who wish to integrate our service into their applications.

consent.title: Legal notice agreement
consent.description: By using this service, you agree to accept our legal notices.

dashboard.title: Let's get started!
dashboard.subtitle: Your link is waiting for you.
dashboard.description: You can now shape the behavior of your shortened link by customizing it to your needs and preferences.
dashboard.hint: You can modify all settings of your link at any time, even after its creation.
dashboard.url_description: Your URL must start with http:// or https:// and must be publicly accessible. Other protocols are ignored for security reasons.
dashboard.slug_description: A slug is a string that uniquely identifies a resource on the Internet. You have the option to customize your link's slug to make it easier to remember.
dashboard.expiration_description: Your link will be automatically disabled and deleted after this date. The current timezone in use is {offset} ({timezone}).

security.title: Protection and security
security.description: These settings allow you to secure access to your link for <danger>you</danger> and <danger>your visitors</danger>.
security.warning_description: Some settings may make your link inaccessible. Please configure them carefully.

password.label: Enable password protection
password.description: Visitors will have to enter a password that you define to access your link. This measure secures your link and prevents unauthorized access.

recaptcha.label: Enable protection via Google reCAPTCHA
recaptcha.description: Visitors will need to solve a reCAPTCHA challenge to access your link. This measure helps protect your link from bots and malware, ensuring enhanced security.

proxy.label: Route through a proxy server
proxy.description: Access to your link will be routed through a proxy server, allowing you to bypass restrictions on certain networks while protecting your IP address from being tracked online.

api.label: Enable API management
api.description: Your link can be managed remotely via an API, allowing you to control access, settings, and view its statistics.

statistics.title: Statistics and tracking
statistics.description: These settings allow you to <success>track</success> your link's performance and <success>analyze</success> its audience.
statistics.warning_description: Depending on your geographic location, some settings may trigger the need for additional consent from your visitors when accessing the link.

access_count.label: Count accesses
access_count.description: The number of accesses will be recorded and displayed in your link management statistics, allowing you to track its popularity and audience.

visitor_data.label: Collect visitor data
visitor_data.description: Visitors' browser data will be collected and displayed in your link management statistics, providing you with a detailed analysis of their activity.

performance.title: Performance and optimization
performance.description: These settings allow you to <warning>boost</warning> your link's loading speed and <warning>enhance</warning> the user experience.

cache.label: Page caching
cache.description: When your link is created, the target page will be cached and served to visitors, speeding up page loading.

domain.label: Use a custom domain
domain.description: Your link will be accessible via a custom domain that you configure, which will enhance your online identity and boost visitor trust.

summary.title: Thank you!
summary.subtitle: Your link is ready to be shared.
summary.description: Below you'll find a summary of the information, settings, and available actions for your shortened link.
summary.hint: Your shortened link was created on {createDate}{isUpdated, select, true { and updated on {updateDate}} other {}}.
summary.qr_code: QR Code for your shortened link
summary.links_description: URLs which have not been visited for one year will be automatically deleted.

actions.title: Available actions
actions.wip: These options are currently under development. They will be available soon.

redirect.title: Just a moment...
redirect.subtitle: You are being redirected to the requested page.
redirect.description: Please note that you are being redirected to another webpage outside of Raven Url Shortener. This page is not hosted by us, and we are not responsible for its content.
redirect.hint: This shortened link was created on {createDate}{isUpdated, select, true { and updated on {updateDate}} other {}}.

accept.only_once_description: You accept the redirection only this time and you will be notified again next time
accept.only_this_url_title: ... and never ask for this URL again
accept.only_this_url_description: You accept the redirection only for this URL and you will not be notified again
accept.all_url_title: ... and never ask for all URLs
accept.all_url_description: You accept the redirection for all URLs and you will not be notified again

legal.title: Serious zone here
legal.subtitle: Below are our legal notices.
legal.description: Legal notices are mandatory information which we must provide to guarantee the transparency and security of our service.

footer.recaptcha_protected: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <a1>Privacy Policy</a1> and <a2>Terms of Service</a2> apply.

recaptcha.missing_or_invalid: The reCAPTCHA token you provided is missing or invalid. Please try again.
recaptcha.score_invalid: The reCAPTCHA score you obtained is invalid. Please try again.
recaptcha.check_failed: The reCAPTCHA token verification failed. Please try again.

slug.missing_or_invalid: The custom slug is missing or invalid. Please try again.
slug.check_failed: The custom slug verification failed. Please try again.

link.missing_or_invalid: The link's unique identifier is missing or invalid. Please try again.
link.fetch_failed: Link information fetching failed. Please try again.

errors.consent_required: You must accept our legal notices to use our service.
errors.generic_unknown: An unknown error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.
errors.already_used_slug: The custom slug you chose is already used by another link. Please choose another one.
errors.duplicated_slug: The slug you chose is already used by another link. Please choose another one.
errors.invalid_url: The URL you provided is invalid. Please check that it starts with http:// or https:// and that it is publicly accessible.
errors.missing_url: The URL you provided is missing. Please provide it to continue.
errors.invalid_slug: The slug you provided is invalid. Please ensure it contains only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.
errors.too_short_slug: The slug you provided is too short. Please choose a longer one.
errors.too_long_slug: The slug you provided is too long. Please choose a shorter one.
errors.invalid_expiration: The expiration date you provided is invalid.

consentModal.title: Do you want a cookie? 🍪
consentModal.description: Our website uses tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The tracking will be enabled only if you accept explicitly.

sections.title: Cookie usage 📢
sections.description: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience.

sections.title: Strictly necessary cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly.

body.name: NEXT_LOCALE
body.description: Cookie set by Next Intl.
body.expiration: Expires at the end of the session.

sections.title: Performance and Analytics cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow the website to remember the choices you have made in the past.

sections.title: Security cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow to authenticate users, prevent fraudulent use of login information and protect Internet users who interact with the website.

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us using our website support.
